Questions.question: What is the main function of the respiratory system?
Which organ is responsible for the exchange of oxygen and carbon dioxide in the respiratory system?
What muscle helps in the process of breathing by contracting and relaxing?
Air enters the body through which of the following structures?
Which part of the respiratory system is responsible for warming and moistening the air we breathe?
The exchange of gases (oxygen and carbon dioxide) in the lungs occurs in the:
Which of the following is NOT a common respiratory disorder?
What are tiny hair-like structures in the respiratory tract that help to trap and remove dust particles and pathogens?
What is the harmful effect of smoking on the respiratory system?
choices: b) Reduces the risk of lung cancer
c) Damages the cilia in the airways
Questions.answer: c) Damages the cilia in the airways
